attributes.action: Stop the expansion of the "Salcombe Social Housing Plan" in order to protect one of the most beautiful places in the British Isles.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We must stop the Salcombe Social Housing Plan. This has been introduced in an underhand and secretive way, with very little opportunity for consultation and even less information about the proposals. This policy could be solely responsible for putting Salcombe on the fast track to ruin.
